attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have become increasingly concerned about the shortage of affordable housing on offer country wide.We as a country have a duty of care to the people born and bred in this country,but due to immigration laws and procedures in place.We full english citizens are backlisted for housing due to the high influx of asylum seekers who enter our country with little to offer,but are housed very quickly and intergrated into our society which has caused so much resentment throughout the country.The true english people awaiting re-homing feel bitter and short changed by the current system/government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
